name: cra-parcel
description: create a React Typescript App project, that uses Parcel for bundling, and Jest for testing

scripts.rename: node -e "require('fs').rename('./templates/react-app-template/package.json', './templates/react-app-template/package-tmp.json', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('file successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.undo-rename: node -e "require('fs').rename('./templates/react-app-template/package-tmp.json', './templates/react-app-template/package.json', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('undo-rename finished successfully!') })"

author: David Harush <davidharush@gmail.com>
